data.title: AMC Stone & Cabinets
data.meta_description: AMC Stone and Cabinet Showroom is Ready to Inspire your Dreams with Kitchen & Bathroom Galleries to Help you Create your Vision. 970-657-2078
data.text:
Are you still deciding on the right look for your new kitchen or bathroom? We strive to offer a level of satisfaction that makes our customers want to return to us in the future. We offer unparalleled quality and unsurpassed design that is guaranteed to exceed your expectations. Our kitchen remodeler can help you imagine the final result with 3D modeling software. We’ll show you different options so you can pick the right look for your home. You can make sure your remodeled kitchen or bathroom will meet your needs before you ever sign a contract. We’ll be with you through every step of the process, from concept to completion and even the after the project is completed.

We offer cabinetry, countertops, sinks and SPC luxury vinyl flooring (waterproof 6mm thick) that suit most budgets and styles. Whether you’re going basic or custom for your kitchen or bathroom remodeling, we have almost everything you need to see your vision become a reality.

Come visit us in one of our 2 locations; Fort Collins and Aurora. We would love to guide you through your remodeling journey.

WE HAVE SEVERAL PLANS TO HELP YOU SAVE MONEY

You don’t have to break the bank over fully customized kitchen cabinets and countertops. Our prefabricated granite and quartz slabs will give you the beautiful countertops you want. Our semi-custom cabinets come in many different colors to match the style of your home. If you want to save even more money, you can pick up and install the hardware yourself.

We also offer discounts for multi-unit remodeling projects. Contact us now for more information.

Are you still deciding on the right look for your new kitchen or bathroom? Our kitchen remodeler can help you imagine the final result with 3D modeling software. We’ll show you different options so you can pick the right look for your home. You can make sure your remodeled kitchen or bathroom will meet your needs before you ever sign a contract.

We are happy to provide a free the 3D design consultation before signing a contract. Stop by our Fort Collins, CO 970-657-2078 and Aurora 720-623-8888 to see how your kitchen or bathroom could look.
